remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关如何构造字体的详细信息，请参阅 [如何：构造字体系列和字体](/dotnet/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-construct-font-families-and-fonts)。For more information about how to construct fonts, see [How to: Construct Font Families and Fonts](/dotnet/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-construct-font-families-and-fonts). Windows 窗体应用程序支持 TrueType 字体，并且对 OpenType 字体的支持有限。Windows Forms applications support TrueType fonts and have limited support for OpenType fonts. 如果尝试使用不支持的字体，或者在运行该应用程序的计算机上未安装该字体，则会替换 Microsoft Sans Serif 字体。If you attempt to use a font that is not supported, or the font is not installed on the machine that is running the application, the Microsoft Sans Serif font will be substituted. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 构造函数和 、 和 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor and the , , and properties. 此示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，该窗体包含一个 名为的，该窗体使用 `ComboBox1` 字符串 "放大" 和 "缩小" 以及一个 名为的 `Label1` 。This example is designed to be used with a Windows Form that contains a named `ComboBox1` that is populated with the strings "Bigger" and "Smaller" and a named `Label1`. 将以下代码粘贴到窗体中，并将该 `ComboBox1_SelectedIndexChanged` 方法与控件的事件相关联 。Paste the following code into the form and associate the `ComboBox1_SelectedIndexChanged` method with the event of the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于基于 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] 和更早版本的本地化应用程序， `prototype` 如果在用于生成应用程序的计算机上没有安装字体，则为其指定字体，而不是使用 Microsoft Sans Serif 字体。For localized applications that are based on the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] and earlier releases, specifying a font for `prototype` when that font has not been installed on the computer that is used to build your application will cause the Microsoft Sans Serif font to be used instead. 如果你的应用程序依赖于此行为，并且你必须为 .NET Framework 3.0 重新编译应用程序，则应为指定 Microsoft Sans Serif 字体 `prototype` 。If your application depends on this behavior and you must recompile your application for the .NET Framework 3.0, you should specify the Microsoft Sans Serif font for `prototype`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示 运算符、 构造函数和 属性。The following code example demonstrates the operator, the constructor, and the property. 此示例旨在与包含名为的按钮的 Windows 窗体一起使用 `Button2` 。This example is designed to be used with a Windows Form that contains a button named `Button2`. 将以下代码粘贴到窗体中，并将该 `Button2_Click` 方法与按钮的 事件关联。Paste the following code into your form and associate the `Button2_Click` method with the button's event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 的行距 是两个连续文本行的基线之间的垂直距离。The line spacing of a is the vertical distance between the base lines of two consecutive lines of text. 因此，行距包含行间距以及字符本身的高度。Thus, the line spacing includes the blank space between lines along with the height of the character itself. 如果 字体的属性设置为以外的任何内容，将 使用屏幕显示的垂直分辨率来计算高度 (以像素为单位) 。If the property of the font is set to anything other than , the height (in pixels) is calculated using the vertical resolution of the screen display. 例如，假设字体单位为英寸，字号为0.3。For example, suppose the font unit is inches and the font size is 0.3. 还假设对于相应的字体系列，全身高度为2048，行距为2355。Also suppose that for the corresponding font family, the em-height is 2048 and the line spacing is 2355. 对于垂直分辨率为每英寸96点的屏幕显示，可以按如下所示计算高度：For a screen display that has a vertical resolution of 96 dots per inch, you can calculate the height as follows: 2355 \* (0.3/2048) \* 96 = 33.117192355\*(0.3/2048)\*96 = 33.11719
